bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration.functions

Class EntityDeltaFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration.functions.AbstractDeltaFunction<ConcentrationDelta>
      • bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration.functions.EntityDeltaFunction

  • public class EntityDeltaFunction
extends AbstractDeltaFunction<ConcentrationDelta>
    Entity delta functions are AbstractDeltaFunctions which return only one concentration delta. Mostly used for EntitySpecific ConcentrationBasedModules, where the function is applied to every ChemicalEntity in every CellSubsection and every Updatable. Each calculation returns the change of the specific entity (e.g. for Diffusion).
